title: CPC commences registration of vehicles for refueling
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation states that registration of vehicles for refueling has commenced.

Accordingly, the corporation stated that three wheelers should be registered with the Police in their area of ​​jurisdiction, while private buses, tourist buses and school vans should register at the SLTB depot in their area.

Meanwhile, the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation assures that there are sufficient diesel reserves in the country. The corporation stated that steps were taken to distribute more than 6,000 metric tons of diesel nationwide yesterday alone, which is an increase of about a thousand MT than previously.
